name: Yohoh.io
description:
Have you ever wanted to become a pirate and rule the islands? Yohoho.io allows you to do this. You become a pirate and must eliminate other pirates and try to grow in size.
You have a cool dashing ability that boosts your pirate speed. Collect gold coins you move around and try to avoid the danger zone – if you fall into it, then you will take damage. Can you become the most feared pirate?
